Name: Bear Soul
About the game: Rockus Games presents you a brand new game created in some genres: Action Adventure Fantasy Platformer Runner Bear Soul is a complex product which combines a lot of different game decisions such as: Physics-based mechanics Platforming and vertical gameplay Dramatic plot and twists Bear Soul is divided into several games, each contains its own characters, mechanics and storyline, but they all are parts of the entire universe. This is the first game in the franchise, the beginning of the whole story and an incredible adventure.
